targetLine.text: Oh, uh, hey you, get your damn hands off her. Do you really think I oughta swear?

contextBefore.text: No, no, George, look, it's just an act, right? Okay, so 9:00â€¦you're strolling through the parking lot, you see us struggling in the car, you walk up, you open the door and you say, your line, George.

contextAfter.text: Yes, definitely, goddamnit George, swear. Okay, so now, you come up, you punch me in the stomach, I'm out for the count, right? And you and Lorraine live happily ever after.
Oh, you make it sound so easy. I just, I wish I wasn't so scared.
George, there's nothing to be scared of. All it takes is a little self-confidence. You know, if you put your mind to it, you could accomplish anything.
